title: (QBO Pro Advisor Only) Virtual Bookkeeper
job_overview:
We are hiring a virtual bookkeeper! Apply by submitting BOTH a LINK to a RESUME and INTRODUCTION VIDEO via direct message to me on platform on OnlineJobs.ph.

Excellent English, verbal and written, plus proven experience in marketing, is the most important thing with this position.

---

We are seeking a highly organized and detail-oriented Virtual Bookkeeper Virtual Assistant to support our business with day-to-day financial operations. The ideal candidate will have strong bookkeeping skills, experience with accounting software, and the ability to work independently while managing multiple tasks efficiently.

Key Responsibilities
Manage accounts payable and receivable
Reconcile bank and credit card statements
Prepare and maintain financial reports
Categorize and enter transactions accurately
Monitor cash flow and update budgets
Assist with payroll processing (if applicable)
Prepare documents for tax filing and liaise with accountants
Maintain organized financial records and documentation
Respond to financial inquiries from the team or clients
Ensure confidentiality and data integrity

Qualifications
You MUST be a QuickBooks Pro Advisor
Excellent attention to detail and organizational skills
Strong communication skills, both written and verbal
Ability to manage time effectively and meet deadlines
Comfortable working independently in a remote setting
